original_question: Light reactions occur during which stage of photosynthesis?

pred_diverse_ans: Light reactions occur in the thylakoid membranes of the chloroplasts during the stage of photosynthesis called the LIGHT REACTIONS.
During the photosynthesis process, light reactions occur in the thylakoid membranes of the chloroplasts
Step 1: Excitation of light-absorbing pigments (such as chlorophyll) and transfer of energy to ATP and NADPH.
